articles.title: Apple says new privacy notifications to roll out in 'early spring' - Reuters
articles.description: Apple Inc said on Thursday that new privacy pop-up notifications will start appearing on most iPhones as soon as "early spring," a requirement that major digital advertising firms such as Facebook Inc have warned will harm their businesses.
